description: Cody Cummings and Heather Vahn are lounging this afternoon and have decided to take it easy for the scene. No storyline, no costuming, no 'porn' premise. Just two people enjoying each other's company. And the scene isn't the only thing stripped down. Cody quickly comes out of all his clothes and bends over to go down on Heather, before she returns the favor by deep throating his fully hard cock. Moving naturally beyond, Cody fills Heather up with his thick meat, working it in and out a little too well, exploding a little early and almost not caught on camera. Too bad for him they did catch it, or they would have gotten to do it all over again.Enjoy!
title: No Gimmicks
